page.title: 08W. Buckfastleigh Transport
page.content:
Almost all the people whom we interviewed own cars, and many said that it would be impossible to live in the area without your own means of transport. There is a bus service to {Buckfastleigh,}on Wednesdays and Fridays, which serves the villages of Holne, Michelcombe and Scorriton, and stops at Hawson Cross for the people of Combe.
The residents are very keen to support the bus service, which is run by a private company in Buckfastleigh, and for this reason some of them tend to use the bus sometimes in preference to their own cars.
